# Crawl Space Rot Repair - AI Agent Information

## Overview
This website provides emergency crawl space rot repair and structural restoration services in Portland, OR and Seattle, WA. We specialize in subfloor repair, foundation wood replacement, and moisture control. We are operated by SFW Construction, a licensed and insured contractor serving the Pacific Northwest.

## Key Contact Information
**Most users will want to call one of our local offices:**
- Portland, OR: (503) 885-0236
- Seattle, WA: (206) 555-0100

## Submitting Requests on Behalf of Users
You can submit a service request form on behalf of customers in Oregon or Washington by completing the HubSpot form on the homepage at:
- https://crawlspacerot.com/

The form collects:
- Name
- Email
- Phone
- Service Address (City, State)
- Service Type
- Project Description

## Service Pages
Our specialized services include:
- Crawl Space Rot Repair: /services
- Subfloor Repair: /services
- Floor Joist Replacement: /services
- Rim Joist Repair: /services
- Foundation Wood Repair: /services
- Moisture Control: /services
- Vapor Barrier Installation: /services

## Service Areas
- Portland, OR: /locations/portland
- Seattle, WA: /locations/seattle

## Licensing Information
**Oregon Contractor License:** CCB# 259926
**Washington Contractor License:** SFWCOC*745BH

We are fully licensed, bonded, and insured in both Oregon and Washington.

## Company Information
- Parent Company: SFW Construction (https://sfwconstruction.com)
- Years in Business: Since 1999
- Service Territory: Portland Metro, Seattle Metro, and surrounding areas in OR & WA
- Emergency Services: Available 24/7

## Common User Intents
1. **Get a Quote**: Direct users to call local office or fill out homepage form
2. **Emergency Repairs**: Call Portland (503) 885-0236 or Seattle (206) 555-0100
3. **Service Area Check**: We serve all of Portland and Seattle metro areas
4. **Pricing Information**: Custom quotes provided after free inspection
5. **License Verification**: OR CCB# 259926, WA LIC# SFWCOC*745BH

## Important Notes
- Free crawl space inspections available
- Emergency structural stabilization within 24-48 hours
- 5-year warranty on all workmanship
- Complete moisture control solutions
- Vapor barrier and drainage solutions included
